...To Be Left Alone.name: ...To Be Left Alone
...To Be Left Alone.description: Stabilize the Cell in the Void Fields.

Dragged Below.name: Dragged Below
Dragged Below.description: Escape the Planetarium or complete wave 50 in Simulacrum.

Guidance Offline.name: Guidance Offline
Guidance Offline.description: Defeat the unique guardian of Siren's Call.

Order Up!.name: Order Up!
Order Up!.description: Complete the Wok’s recipe in Reformed Altar.

Pause..name: Pause.
Pause..description: Free the survivor suspended in time.

Power Plant.name: Power Plant
Power Plant.description: Repair the broken robot with an Escape Pod's Fuel Array.

Purified Freedom.name: Purified Freedom
Purified Freedom.description: Purify the Heart of the False Son using the Halcyon Seed.

Verified.name: Verified
Verified.description: Complete the first Teleporter event 5 times.

Warrior.name: Warrior
Warrior.description: Reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event without dying.

\"Is This Bugged?\".name: "Is This Bugged?"
\"Is This Bugged?\".description: Fail the Shrine of Chance 3 times in a row.

...Maybe One More..name: ...Maybe One More.
...Maybe One More..description: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D Printer.

Automation Activation.name: Automation Activation
Automation Activation.description: Activate 6 turrets in a single run.

Blockade Breaker.name: Blockade Breaker
Blockade Breaker.description: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.
Blockade Breaker.unlock:
Visions of Heresy

Hooks of Heresy
 
Essence of Heresy
 
Strides of Heresy

Death Do Us Part.name: Death Do Us Part
Death Do Us Part.description: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

Deicide.name: Deicide
Deicide.description: Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

Deja Vu?.name: Deja Vu?
Deja Vu?.description: Loop back to the first stage.

Experimenting.name: Experimenting
Experimenting.description: Pick up 5 different types of Equipment.

Flawless.name: Flawless
Flawless.description: Fully charge a Teleporter without getting hit.

Glorious Battle.name: Glorious Battle
Glorious Battle.description: Charge the Teleporter with less than 10% health.

Keyed Up.name: Keyed Up
Keyed Up.description: Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds.

King of the Hill.name: King of the Hill
King of the Hill.description: Journey to the Prime Meridian and defeat the False Son.

Naturopath.name: Naturopath
Naturopath.description: Without healing, reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event.

Never Back Down.name: Never Back Down
Never Back Down.description: In 4 consecutive stages don’t leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

Newtist.name: Newtist
Newtist.description: Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars.

The Calm.name: The Calm
The Calm.description: Escape the moon on Monsoon difficulty.

The Demons And The Crabs.name: The Demons And The Crabs
The Demons And The Crabs.description: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

The Long Road.name: The Long Road
The Long Road.description: Complete 20 stages in a single run.

Warmonger.name: Warmonger
Warmonger.description: Complete 3 Combat Shrines in a single stage.

Ascendant.name: Ascendant
Ascendant.description: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Mountain.

Blackout.name: Blackout
Blackout.description: Defeat the unique guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating.

Cleanup Duty.name: Cleanup Duty
Cleanup Duty.description: Destroy 20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

Cosmic Explorer.name: Cosmic Explorer
Cosmic Explorer.description: Discover and enter three unique portals.

Moon Worshipper.name: Moon Worshipper
Moon Worshipper.description: Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run.

One with the Woods.name: One with the Woods
One with the Woods.description: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

[REDACTED].name: [REDACTED]
[REDACTED].description: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

Acrid: Bad Medicine.name: Acrid: Bad Medicine
Acrid: Bad Medicine.description: As Acrid, land the final blow on a Scavenger.

Acrid: Easy Prey.name: Acrid: Easy Prey
Acrid: Easy Prey.description: As Acrid, land the killing blow on 50 total enemies that have 1 hit point left.

Acrid: Pandemic.name: Acrid: Pandemic
Acrid: Pandemic.description: As Acrid, inflict Poison 1000 total times.

Artificer: Chunked!.name: Artificer: Chunked!
Artificer: Chunked!.description: As Artificer, fully defeat the teleporter boss in a one-second burst of damage.

Artificer: Massacre.name: Artificer: Massacre
Artificer: Massacre.description: As Artificer, perform a multikill of 20 enemies.

Artificer: Orbital Bombardment.name: Artificer: Orbital Bombardment
Artificer: Orbital Bombardment.description: As Artificer, kill 15 enemies before touching the ground.

Bandit: B&E.name: Bandit: B&E
Bandit: B&E.description: As Bandit, kill the final boss with 'Lights Out'.

Bandit: Classic Man.name: Bandit: Classic Man
Bandit: Classic Man.description: As Bandit, successfully use 'Lights Out' to reset your cooldowns 15 times in a row.

Bandit: Sadist.name: Bandit: Sadist
Bandit: Sadist.description: As Bandit, kill a monster with 20 stacks of Hemorrhage.

CHEF: Barbecued Bison Recipe Complete.name: CHEF: Barbecued Bison Recipe Complete
CHEF: Barbecued Bison Recipe Complete.description: As CHEF complete 10 recipes by searing an oiled bison with Sear.

CHEF: It's Getting Hot In Here!.name: CHEF: It's Getting Hot In Here!
CHEF: It's Getting Hot In Here!.description: As CHEF apply 20 stacks of Burn at once to Mithrix.

CHEF: You've Always Been Crazy.name: CHEF: You've Always Been Crazy
CHEF: You've Always Been Crazy.description: As CHEF hit five airborne enemies with one instance of Roll.

Captain: Smushed.name: Captain: Smushed
Captain: Smushed.description: As Captain, kill the final boss using a Supply Beacon

Captain: Wanderlust.name: Captain: Wanderlust
Captain: Wanderlust.description: As Captain, visit 10 different environments in a single run.

Captain: Worth Every Penny.name: Captain: Worth Every Penny
Captain: Worth Every Penny.description: As Captain, repair and recruit a TC-280 Prototype.

Commando: Godspeed.name: Commando: Godspeed
Commando: Godspeed.description: As Commando, fully charge the first-stage teleporter before the timer hits 5 minutes.

Commando: Incorruptible.name: Commando: Incorruptible
Commando: Incorruptible.description: As Commando, clear 20 stages in a single run without picking up any Lunar items.

Commando: Rolling Thunder.name: Commando: Rolling Thunder
Commando: Rolling Thunder.description: As Commando, land the killing blow on an Overloading Worm.

Engineer: 100% Calculated.name: Engineer: 100% Calculated
Engineer: 100% Calculated.description: As Engineer, defeat the teleporter boss in less than 5 seconds after it spawns.

Engineer: Better With Friends.name: Engineer: Better With Friends
Engineer: Better With Friends.description: As Engineer, recruit 12 minions at one time.

Engineer: Zero Sum.name: Engineer: Zero Sum
Engineer: Zero Sum.description: As Engineer, finish charging the teleporter with zero monsters remaining on the stage.

False Son: Family Bonding.name: False Son: Family Bonding
False Son: Family Bonding.description: As False Son, have Aurelionite kill Mithrix while Mithrix is inflicted with at least one Lunar Ruin.

False Son: Protein Heavy Diet.name: False Son: Protein Heavy Diet
False Son: Protein Heavy Diet.description: As False Son, gain up to 40 Lunar Spikes through Growth.

False Son: Stare Them Down.name: False Son: Stare Them Down
False Son: Stare Them Down.description: As False Son, kill 15 enemies with one activation of Laser of the Father.

Huntress: Finishing Touch.name: Huntress: Finishing Touch
Huntress: Finishing Touch.description: As Huntress, land a killing blow with every possible hit of a single glaive.

Huntress: One Shot, One Kill.name: Huntress: One Shot, One Kill
Huntress: One Shot, One Kill.description: As Huntress, collect and carry 12 Crowbars at once.

Huntress: Piercing Wind.name: Huntress: Piercing Wind
Huntress: Piercing Wind.description: As Huntress, start and finish either Rallypoint Delta or Scorched Acres without falling below 100% health.

Loader: Earthshatter.name: Loader: Earthshatter
Loader: Earthshatter.description: As Loader, land a Charged Gauntlet hit at 300mph or higher.

Loader: Swing By.name: Loader: Swing By
Loader: Swing By.description: As Loader, reach and proceed through the Celestial Portal in 25 minutes or less.

Loader: The Thunderdome.name: Loader: The Thunderdome
Loader: The Thunderdome.description: As Loader, kill three other Loaders in the Bulwark's Ambry.

MUL-T: Gotcha!.name: MUL-T: Gotcha!
MUL-T: Gotcha!.description: As MUL-T, land the killing blow on an Imp Overlord with the Preon Accumulator.

MUL-T: Pest Control.name: MUL-T: Pest Control
MUL-T: Pest Control.description: As MUL-T, defeat two Beetle Queens without leaving the teleporter zone.

MUL-T: Seventh Day.name: MUL-T: Seventh Day
MUL-T: Seventh Day.description: As MUL-T, clear the Void Fields on Stage 7 or later.

Mercenary: Demon of the Skies.name: Mercenary: Demon of the Skies
Mercenary: Demon of the Skies.description: As Mercenary, don't touch the ground for 30 seconds.

Mercenary: Ethereal.name: Mercenary: Ethereal
Mercenary: Ethereal.description: As Mercenary, complete a Prismatic Trial without falling below 100% health.

Mercenary: Flash of Blades.name: Mercenary: Flash of Blades
Mercenary: Flash of Blades.description: As Mercenary, use 20 abilities in 10 seconds.

REX: Bushwhacked.name: REX: Bushwhacked
REX: Bushwhacked.description: As REX, complete an entire teleporter event while under 50% health.

REX: Dunked.name: REX: Dunked
REX: Dunked.description: As REX, kill a Clay Dunestrider on Abandoned Aqueduct by throwing it into a pit.

REX: Full of Life.name: REX: Full of Life
REX: Full of Life.description: As REX, heal for 1000 health at once.

Railgunner: Annihilator.name: Railgunner: Annihilator
Railgunner: Annihilator.description: As Railgunner, deal 1,000,000 damage in one shot.

Railgunner: Marksman.name: Railgunner: Marksman
Railgunner: Marksman.description: As Railgunner, fire 30 consecutive sniper shots without missing a Weak Point.

Railgunner: Trickshot.name: Railgunner: Trickshot
Railgunner: Trickshot.description: As Railgunner, get 3 kills with a single Supercharge shot while airborne.

Seeker: Airborne Souls.name: Seeker: Airborne Souls
Seeker: Airborne Souls.description: As Seeker, hit three or more airborne enemies with a single use of the exploding third hit of Spirit Punch.

Seeker: Clear Mind.name: Seeker: Clear Mind
Seeker: Clear Mind.description: As Seeker, meditate 20 times without missing an input in a single run.

Seeker: Scorched Earth.name: Seeker: Scorched Earth
Seeker: Scorched Earth.description: Deal 500,000% damage with one use of Sojourn's explosion.

Acrid: Cleared Prime Meridian.name: Acrid: Cleared Prime Meridian
Acrid: Cleared Prime Meridian.description: As Acrid, complete the Event on Prime Meridian.

Acrid: Mastery.name: Acrid: Mastery
Acrid: Mastery.description: As Acrid, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

Artificer: Cleared Prime Meridian.description: As Artificer, complete the Event on Prime Meridian.

Artificer: Mastery.description: As Artificer, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.
